title: Online Collaborative Project-Based Social Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of elementary education curricula and fundamental digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Aimed at in-service elementary educators strengthening social studies competencies through asynchronous collaborative learning via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can complete social studies project assignments with over 80% participation through online collaboration with peers
Learners can perform three or more feedback and interaction cycles among peers using digital communication tools
Learners can concretely articulate problem-solving and critical thinking competencies acquired during collaborative processes through formative assessments

resources: Collaborative Mobile App (KakaoTalk Team Chat/Slack Mobile Version, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
